Package com.linecorp.armeria.server

Class ServerCacheControlBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.common.CacheControlBuilder<ServerCacheControlBuilder>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerCacheControlBuilder
  • public final class ServerCacheControlBuilder
extends CacheControlBuilder<ServerCacheControlBuilder>
    Creates a new ServerCacheControl using the builder pattern. 
    
 ServerCacheControl cacheControl =
     new ServerCacheControlBuilder()
         .noCache()
         .noStore()
         .mustRevalidate()
         .build();
    See Also:
    ClientCacheControlBuilder, HTTP Caching (Google), Cache-Control (MDN)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ServerCacheControlBuilder()
      Creates a new builder with all directives disabled initially.
